Roberto Fernandez

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/2226063361415586
  • Última atualização do currículo em 10/12/2014

My main field of research is mathematical statistical mechanics (classical and quantum). In this field I have worked on rigorous determination of critical exponents, non-Gibbs phenomena, uniqueness criteria, convergence of cluster expansions and quantum phase diagrams. I also work in the theory of stochastic processes, with emphasis in chains with long memory. Other topics include perfect simulation algorithms, cutoff and escape behavior in Markov processes and applications of stochastic processes to biological processes and language acquisition (Texto informado pelo autor)
